 {
   "title": "My api",
   "version": "v1",
   "resources": [
     {
       "description": "this is res1 description",
       "displayName": "resource 1",
       "relativeUri": "/res1",
       "methods": [
         {
           "description": "get into resource 1",
           "method": "get"
         }
       ],
       "relativeUriPathSegments": [
         "res1"
       ]
     },
     {
       "description": "this is res1 description",
       "displayName": "resource 1",
       "relativeUri": "/res2",
       "methods": [
         {
           "description": "get into resource 1",
           "method": "get"
         }
       ],
       "relativeUriPathSegments": [
         "res2"
       ]
     }
   ]
 }
